localProof.headline: Where to Find Us in Orlando
localProof.directions: We are conveniently located at 4892 International Drive, right across from Universal Studios and just minutes from EPCOT and Magic Kingdom. If you are taking I-4, take Exit 74 for quick access to our Orlando location. We're right in the heart of the tourist corridor, easy to find.

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Orlando, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Orlando are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. One of Florida's most important protections is the 'one loan at a time' rule. You cannot have more than one payday loan outstanding anywhere in Florida, and you must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Orlando must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

reviews.name: Kevin H.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Central Florida Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our International Drive location? We also serve these nearby communities:

faq.question: Where is your Orlando cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Orlando branch is located at 4892 International Drive, Suite 300, right in the tourist corridor near Universal Studios, EPCOT, and Magic Kingdom. We're easy to find off I-4 Exit 74.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Orlando location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. No appointment needed!

faq.question: Do you serve tourists visiting Orlando?
faq.answer: Yes! We serve both residents and visitors to Orlando. You'll need a valid government-issued ID (passport is fine) and proof of income. Many of our customers are visitors who need emergency cash during their stay.

faq.question: What if I'm from out of state?
faq.answer: Florida's payday loan laws apply to everyone borrowing in Florida, regardless of where you're from. As long as you have valid ID and verifiable income, you can apply at our Orlando location.

faq.question: How much can I borrow in Orlando?
faq.answer: Single-payment loans are capped at $500, and installment loans go up to $1,000 under Florida law. The actual amount you can borrow depends on your income and how much you can afford to repay.
